thread.section_title: Rentalcars.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rentalcars.com | www.rentalcars.com
thread.title: MIGUEL GONZALEZ

author: MIGUEL GONZALEZ
title: MIGUEL GONZALEZ
text: They never send me the booking number when I book the first time with them, they never send me the name of the car rental company, I did download the app, I put my email and I still waiting for the booking number and finally I found the Customer Service phone number and I wait 57 minutes...Yes 57 minutes. I was with my wife and kids and we were crazy my wife and kids started crying this was an horrible experience. First and Last.
